mapper.select:
SELECT REQUESTDATE,REQUESTTIME,FRONTSERIALDATA,PRODUCTCODE,ACTIONCODE, ACTIONTYPE,TRADEORG ,TRADENAME,REMARK,DEALSTATUS,TRADEDATE,TYPEOFEVENT, COMMENTS,AMOUNT1,AMOUNT2,SPOTRATE,SPLITRATE,VALUEDATE,DOWNLOADKEY,USERS_SHORTNAME, PAIRS_SHORTNAME,FOLDERS_SHORTNAME,CPTY_SHORTNAME,FOLDERS_SPOT1SHORTNAME, FOLDERS_SPOT2SHORTNAME,CURRENCIES_SPLITSHORTNAME,CLEARINGMODESSHORTNAME, PAIRS_SPLITSHORTNAME,PAIRS_LOCALSHORTNAME,PURPOSESSHORTNAME,RESPONSEDATE, RESPONSETIME,KONDORSERIALDATA,TRADESTATUS,ERRORCODE,ERRORMESSAGE,ACCOUNTSTATUS FROM KON_SPOTTRADE WHERE FRONTSERIALDATA LIKE '%${rpcNo}%'
AND REQUESTDATE>=#{startDate} and #{endDate}>=REQUESTDATE
AND PRODUCTCODE=#{tradeCode}
ORDER BY REQUESTDATE DESC,REQUESTTIME DESC
